name: .prev
description: Get the immediate element prior to each of the current elements, optionally matching the provided selector or element(s)

arguments.name: comparison
arguments.description: The selector or element(s) to compare the sibling of each current element to. If it's an array-like or zQuery object, only one element in the object must match for it to count as a match.

returns: A new zQuery instance containing the elements that are directly before the current elements
